item.title: No. 24 Kansas Will Play Vegas Tournament Without Star Freshman Darryn Peterson
item.description: No. 24 Kansas will be without star freshman Darryn Peterson for a tournament in Las Vegas next week

item.title: Cowboys WR George Pickens on Time With Steelers: 'I Made Some Mistakes'
item.description: Dallas Cowboys wide receiver George Pickens opened up about regrets that he has regarding his time with the Pittsburgh Steelers.

item.title: Mariners Will Retire No. 51, Again, This Time For Hall of Famer Randy Johnson
item.description: The Seattle Mariners say Hall of Fame left-hander Randy Johnson's No. 51 will be retired during a pregame ceremony next season.
